meanings.definition: Rasterises (verb): converts an image into a raster format
meanings.sent1: She rasterises the photo to make it suitable for printing.
meanings.sent2: The software rasterises the graphic for better quality.
meanings.sent3: When he tried to rasterises the picture, it turned into a pixelated mess!
meanings.sent4: Her artistic touch rasterises the image into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The way she rasterises the colors brings the picture to life.

meanings.definition: Rasterises (noun): the process of converting an image into a raster format
meanings.sent1: The rasterises of the image was done quickly by the designer.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the rasterises is crucial for digital artists.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious world of rasterises fascinated the young student.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the rasterises lies in its intricate details.
